EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451CFGrowth&MultiCloud_AR_Q417.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Cloud Foundry Showcases Impressive Growth and Multi-Cloud Use
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the 451 Research report: Cloud Foundry Showcases Impressive Growth and Multi-Cloud Use. For additional resources, including analyst reports, webinars and eBooks, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
